protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the transfer of a two-carbon ketol group from a ketose donor to an aldose acceptor, via a covalent intermediate with the cofactor thiamine pyrophosphate (By similarity).

reference.reference_text: Coy JF, Dubel S, Kioschis P, Thomas K, Micklem G, Delius H, Poustka A: Molecular cloning of tissue-specific transcripts of a transketolase-related gene: implications for the evolution of new vertebrate genes. Genomics. 1996 Mar 15;32(3):309-16.
